description:
Another bad day at the mine shaft for cryptocurrencies 6 Feb
Bitcoin briefly posted sub-6000 on Bitstamp but there would appear to be a bit of demand down there. Beats me why but, hey, there's got to be someone taking profit too on shorts.
By Mike Paterson
text:
Another bad day at the mine shaft for cryptocurrencies 6 Feb
Bitcoin briefly posted sub-6000 on Bitstamp but there would appear to be a bit of demand down there. Beats me why but, hey, there's got to be someone taking profit too on shorts.
Currently 6117 but still looking fragile. What do our crypto traders make of it all down here?
title: Bitcoin touches USD 6000 as the tumble continues
